snippet: Lost amid the unadulterated giddiness in the Garden over Jeremy Lin was the reality that Kobe Bryant’s disappointing game will be his only visit to the area this year.
abstract: Lost amid the unadulterated giddiness in Madison Square Garden over New York Knicks phenom Jeremy Lin is the reality that Los Angeles Lakers star Kobe Bryant’s disappointing game will be his only visit to the area this year.
lead_paragraph: Lost amid the unadulterated giddiness in the Garden over Jeremy Lin was the reality that Kobe Bryant’s disappointing game will be his only visit to the area this year.

headline.seo: Sluggish First Quarter Hurt Bryant and Lakers vs. Knicks
headline.main: Sluggish First Quarter Hurts Bryant and Lakers
headline.print_headline: Sluggish First Quarter Hurts Bryant and Lakers
